data.eml:eml: The tardigrade fauna of Australian marine caves: With descriptions of nine new species of Arthrotardigrada

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jørgensen, Aslak, Boesgaard, Tom M., Møbjerg, Nadja, Kristensen, Reinhardt M. (2014): The tardigrade fauna of Australian marine caves: With descriptions of nine new species of Arthrotardigrada. Zootaxa 3802 (4): 401-443, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3802.4.1
